languages.text: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} убивает цель, применив Награду за голову, то попадание его следующей атаки в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If Slay the Game kills an enemy, the Hunter's next attack this turn will always score a critical hit.
If Slay the Game kills an enemy, the Hunter's next attack this turn will always score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: Если охотник убивает цель, применив Охотничьи забавы, то попадание его следующей атаки в этом ходу всегда будет критическим.
Если охотник убивает цель, применив Охотничьи забавы, то попадание его следующей атаки в этом ходу всегда будет критическим.

languages.text: 如果索取赏金杀死了敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的下次攻击必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
languages.original_text: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果索取赏金杀死了敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的下次攻击必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。

languages.text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a un enemigo con Cobrar la recompensa, su próximo ataque en este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} siempre causará un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.
languages.original_text: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a un enemigo con Matar a la presa, su próximo ataque en este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} siempre causará un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn Das Kopfgeld einfordern einen Feind tötet, erzielt der nächste Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn Das Wild erlegen einen Feind tötet, erzielt der nächste Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.

languages.text: Si Obtention de la prime tue un ennemi, la prochaine attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} se traduit toujours par un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
languages.original_text: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si Tuer le Gibier tue un ennemi, l'attaque suivante menée par le Chasseur au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} se traduit toujours par un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.

languages.text: 報酬ゲットで敵を倒した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}のこの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の次の攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 遊びの終わりで敵を倒した場合、ハンターのこの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の次の攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。

languages.text: Başa Konulan Ödül, bir düşmanı öldürürse {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı'nın{/g} o turdaki bir sonraki saldırısı her daim {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yapar.
